mapper.select: select count(distinct p.post_idx) from post p, category c, dream.match m where p.m_idx=#{param1} and c.cat_idx=p.cat_idx and p.wanted=#{param2} and m.post_idx=p.post_idx;

select distinct p.post_nm, p.post_idx, c.cat_nm, p.post_regdate from post p join category c on c.cat_idx=p.cat_idx, dream.match m where p.m_idx=#{param1} and p.wanted=#{param2} and m.post_idx=p.post_idx ;

select mem.m_photo, mem.m_idx, p.post_idx, mem.m_nm, pr.line, m.match_idx, m.match_yn from post p, category c, dream.match m, member mem, profile pr where p.m_idx=#{param1} and p.wanted=#{param2} and p.post_idx=#{param3} and m.post_idx=p.post_idx and pr.m_idx=mem.m_idx and c.cat_idx=p.cat_idx and
case when p.wanted like 'mentor' then mem.m_idx=m.mentor_idx when p.wanted like 'mentee' then mem.m_idx=m.mentee_idx end order by m.match_idx;
